com.smartitengineering.version.api.spi
Interface MutableResource

All Superinterfaces:
Content, Resource
All Known Implementing Classes:
ResourceImpl
public interface MutableResource
extends Resource

MutableResource represents an object intended to versioned.

Author:
imyousuf

Method Detail

setContent

void setContent(Content content)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the content of the resource. Setting the content directly will reset the contentAsStream, contentLoaded and contentSize.

Parameters:
content - Can not be null
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If and only if content is NULL

setId

void setId(java.lang.String id)
Return the ID of the resource.

Parameters:
id - Identifier for the resource

setDeleted

void setDeleted(boolean deleted)
Set whether the resource's current state represents whether the its been deleted or not.

Parameters:
deleted - True if resource has been deleted.

setMimeType

void setMimeType(java.lang.String mimeType)
Set the mime-type of the resource.

Parameters:
mimeType - MIME Type of the resource
